CONJUGATES: bingoes (plural, rare) | bingoed (past tense, verb, rare) | bingoing (present participle, verb, rare)
ETYMOLOGY: Possibly an alteration of the earlier game name 'beano', or perhaps an imitative exclamation shouted by the winner, similar to the sound of a bell or signal.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun) or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A game of chance in which players mark off numbers on cards as they are drawn randomly, the winner being the first to mark off all their numbers in a specific pattern (e.g., a line or full card).
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 宾果游戏，一种博彩游戏。玩家在一张印有数字的卡片上划掉随机抽出的数字，最先完成特定模式并喊出“Bingo！”者获胜。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We went to the local hall on Tuesday night for a game of bingo.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 周二晚上我们去了当地的大厅玩宾果游戏。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: An abrupt remark made especially to express emotion or surprise.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An exclamation shouted by the winner of the game; used generally to express sudden success, realization, or confirmation that something has been correctly identified or achieved.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: （感叹词）中了！就是这个！用来表示突然的成功、领悟或确认某事被正确识别或达成。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: That’s the exact word I was looking for! Bingo!
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 那就是我一直在找的词！中啦！
